author: Marvel Entertainment
description:
Join Professional LEGO artist Adam Ward as he brings the Fantastic Four’s robotic companion, H.E.R.B.I.E., to life! The Fantastic Four: First Steps is now streaming on @disneyplus.

► SUBSCRIBE to the channel to get notified when new Marvel videos are posted: https://www.youtube.com/marvel?sub_confirmation=1

title: Building Fantastic Four's H.E.R.B.I.E. Out of LEGO® Bricks
